body_html:
@ebrevdo: I specified the backward-compatibility in the summary. Let me know if there is anything unclear.
I redid the tests a bit. tf.convert_to_tensor does not really do what I want. Instead I made all the asserts explicit in the code, so a function to get the shapes of all tensors in a tuple is not needed.
body_text:
@ebrevdo: I specified the backward-compatibility in the summary. Let me know if there is anything unclear.
I redid the tests a bit. tf.convert_to_tensor does not really do what I want. Instead I made all the asserts explicit in the code, so a function to get the shapes of all tensors in a tuple is not needed.
body:
@ebrevdo: I specified the backward-compatibility in the summary. Let me know if there is anything unclear.
I redid the tests a bit. `tf.convert_to_tensor` does not really do what I want. Instead I made all the asserts explicit in the code, so a function to get the shapes of all tensors in a tuple is not needed.
